column1: DeAndre Yedlin ruled out of trip to Huddersfield with Newcastle set to name makeshift back four
Chancel Mbema misses NUFC trip to Swansea. Dwight Gayle in squad, DeAndre Yedlin amp; Florian Lejeune have a good chance. Massadio Haidara out.
DeAndre Yedlin admits he's in a battle with three other players for the rightback slot
